query: ALTER TABLE mfa_audit_log MODIFY COLUMN action ENUM('setup','enable','disable','verify_success','verify_fail','backup_code_used','device_trusted','device_removed','email_sent','email_verified','sms_sent','sms_verified','mfa_reset_by_admin') NOT NULL;
